entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023
